title: Gwent History and Mystery
description: The ancient Kingdom of Gwent has a long history dating back to prehistoric times. It also has some great ghost stories. Read about the Gwyllion, a race of fairies that haunt the mountains leading the unwary astray, premonitions of disasters and spirits who return to give messages to the living. Some of the haunted places included here are Crown Buildings Pontypool, Mine Ghosts, Newport Castle, Horse and Jockey inn and more
author: Carol Ann Lewis
